    is_function_here

    is_function_here.Rmd


    library(cuteDev)


    Datasets 

    f <- "ggplot2::geom_point"
path <- "blablabla"


    Datasets info 

    f # Character vector of function name
> [1] "ggplot2::geom_point"
path # character vector specifying the absolute pathways of the directories, this lib.path will return an error
> [1] "blablabla"


    Argument fun 

    is_function_here(fun = f) # check if the package serpentine is in the computer


    Argument lib.path 

    is_function_here(
    fun = f,
    lib.path = "."
    ) # check if the function is present in the package
> Error: 
> 
> ================
> 
> ERROR IN is_function_here()
> REQUIRED PACKAGE:
> ggplot2MUST BE INSTALLED IN ONE OF THESE FOLDERS:
> /__w/cuteDev/cuteDev/vignettes/articles
> /usr/local/lib/R/site-library
> /usr/local/lib/R/library
> 
> ================


    All the arguments 

    is_function_here(
    fun = f,
    lib.path = path
    ) # check if the function is present in the package, returns an error because the path doesn't exist
> Error: 
> 
> ================
> 
> ERROR IN is_function_here(): DIRECTORY PATH INDICATED IN THE lib.path ARGUMENT DOES NOT EXISTS:
> blablabla
> 
> ================

    ```
